cold > sold > sod: 𒈻 sed "cold, cool, winter" 𒈻 sed शीत śīta cold cít sad содо sodo NE-Caucasian 𒈺 sed₃ šed₉ শীত śit winter "winter" 𒈺 se24, še12 <> Schnee snow 𒈹 sed₆ 𒀀𒈹 še₁₂ 𒀀𒈹𒁲 še₁₈ 𒍝𒈹𒁲 še₅ 𒁇 sed₄ 𒈜 še₁₁ 𒊺𒉣𒉣 še₁₅ 𒆒 šed₅ #kuşu kuşşu •kuls < cold

𒈻𒈻𒁮 sed-sed-dam sedsedam early morning <> Venus

𒈹 sukuš <> 𒀭𒈹𒋝 SIG evening star Venus

𒈹 suh₁₀ 𒄗 suh crown

𒈹 Freda Fria Frau Inanna Ishtar <> north easter
